name: Sands of Dolhein
description:
For the World Building GameJam II

Collaborators: Dom H., Tiffany W., AvocadoFire, abstrkt

---

You arrive on an alien planet. There are signs of civilization but no life. As you make your way through the expansive terrain you come across the ruins of last technologies, their functions unknown. Some of them still retain power and can be flipped on and off. The buildings have been beaten by the elements, covered in a layer of sand, and worn by time.
